user.title: Eglo Remote ZHA
user.description:
This integration provides custom ZHA quirks for Eglo/AwoX ERCU_3groups_Zm remote controls.

The quirks will be automatically registered with ZHA when this integration is enabled.

After enabling, restart Home Assistant and pair your remote via ZHA.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only one instance of Eglo Remote ZHA is allowed.
